description:
Hi! This a really nice & clean 3 bedroom apartment. It is a brand new 3 bedroom apt with wood floors and brand new appliances.

We are about 6 min walk to the train that takes you directly into manhattan. There are several trains in the neighborhood...

The neighborhood is an up & coming real brooklyn neighborhood. 

We look forward to having you stay in our nice & new apartment.

Thanks!

This is a 3 bedroom apartment that is private with its own entrance. New wood floors. All new appliances. Lots of Windows and close to the subway.

You will have your own apartment. It is not shared. It is a private apartment with 3 real bedrooms.  You have your own entrance with access directly into the apartment.

Close to the trains...about a 6 min walk.
name: Brand new & nice private 3 bedroom!
